title: A New Bicycle
story: Last week, Tom wanted to buy a new bicycle.
He saved money for several months.
He has already ridden it three times since then.
He has never felt so happy with a bike before.

questions.question: When did Tom buy the bicycle?
How many times has he ridden it?

tense_identification.sentence: He has already ridden it three times.
He saved money for several months.
